isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING LIGHT SYSTEMS - DESCRIPTION - WORK LIGHT W/O SLEEPER

svcproc.title: WORK LIGHT W/O SLEEPER
svcproc.para: The work light circuit consists of a work light, a work light switch, and an indicator light located in the instrument cluster. This light is located on the back of the cab and provides light for the operator when the trailer air and electrical lines are being connected or disconnected from the trailer.
